    Recovery

    Email Sent! Please check your inbox for your recovery email. This could take a few minutes to send.

    Your environment URL is necessary to access any databases you have created in HITS If you do not have your original environment URL, try the following:

    1. If you haven't used HITS before, request an account via the Request an account section of the HITS Dashboard Welcome page
    2. If you have used HITS before, search your email for the original environment URL which was sent to you by NSIP.
    3. Otherwise use the form below to request NSIP to resend your Enviroment URL to you.
